***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [əd͡ʑa]
**** Noun[edit] ****
अजा • (ajā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐀𑐖𑐵)
   1. paternal_grandfather

**** Etymology[edit] ****
Feminine form of अज (aja, “he-goat, driver”), from the root अज् (aj, “to
drive”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Vedic) IPA(key): /ɐ.d͡ʑɑː/
    * (Classical) IPA(key): /ˈɐ.d͡ʑɑː/
**** Noun[edit] ****
अजा • (ajā) f
   1. female noun of प्रकृति, of माया or Illusion
   2. she-goat, nanny-goat
   3. name of a plant whose bulbs resemble the udder of a goat
